text: Egha me gɨn senbar a ike, egha a inigha ghua Romɨn gavmanɨn gumazir ekiam Pailatɨn agharim gatɨ.27:2 Pailat Romɨn gumazim. Romɨn gavman Judan atrivimɨn anetɨ. Judaba uari Iesusɨn mɨsueghan kogham. Romɨn gavmanra gumazibav soghtɨma da arɨmɨghiram. Kamaghɨn Judaba Iesus inigha Pailat bagha ghu. Nɨ Jon 18:31ɨn gan.
